Hello fumm22 and welcome!

I'd be grateful if you could add some further information to your build, and edit to include all the features detailed here from the Rules and Tools forum. It sounds pedantic, I know, but it will help readers get a better understanding of the build, and anyone planning on playing the build to see how it might be tweaked to their own environment/preferences.

Thanks in advance.

Cheers

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Welcome fumm22!
Cool build!
Nice AC buffed. 10 + 16 (capped dex) + 8 (tumble) + 10 (PM 16) +20 (EMA) + 8 (+5 tower) + 10 (improved expertise) = 82.
Combined with the 580 -> 820hp (capped Con), PM crit / sneak immunity, Barbarian damage reduction 4/-, damage resistance belts, damage reduction from epic warding/ premonition/greater stoneskin,  improved invisibility for 50% concealment, death and mind immunity buffs or items (instant death/mind affecting spells I presume could be a weakness), it looks like a pretty effective tank !
I don't mind you including it in your main post, good to have a small amount of showing off :)

Were you ever tempted to include terrifying rage into your build, by the way, or were skillpoints the issue there?

posts.author: fumm22
posts.content: yes would be good to get one more point of int instead of str and get terrifying rage. i used barbarian mainly for the greater rage because on the PW i play on if your strength is already capped before you rage then you get +3ab from greater rage.
